event.title: Libre Software Meeting (aka RMLL), Bordeaux, France
event.body: The 2010 Libre Software Meeting is a non commercial conference with talks, workshops and round tables about Free Software and its uses. The LSM provides a place for exchange and meeting between Free Software developers, users and stakeholders. This year, it will be at Bordeaux 1 University. Update: The FSFE will present its activities at a booth. We are still looking for helpers at that booth. Whoever is interested to join should contact <rk at office dot fsfeurope dot org>.
